title: 20 - Favorable Colors
description: These are colors that resonate well with your name, not necessarily meaning you should use them in all aspects, but they are colors with good vibrations for you. Colors: White: symbolizes light, joy, the power of God, and purity. Yellow: symbolizes divine love, understanding, and charity. Blue: symbolizes eternity, wisdom, and will. Green: symbolizes life, growth, and hope. Violet: symbolizes dignity and knowledge. Red: symbolizes emotions. Black: symbolizes sadness and darkness.

1.title: Expression 1
1.data: all shades of yellow and orange, brown, gold, green, cream, and white.

2.title: Expression 2
2.data: all shades of green, cream, white, and gray.

5.title: Expression 5
5.data: all light colors, gray, and silver.

7.title: Expression 7
7.data: green, yellow, white, gray, and light blue.

8.title: Expression 8
8.data: purple, gray, blue, black, and brown.
